QuestData.Title: Crumbling Apart
QuestData.Description:
De mogu army grows with each passing moment thanks to their animated stone warriors. It is only a matter of time before their forces are back at full strength.
A thousand curses upon Zul. He was forbidden from bringing his pets here--and from resurrecting de Thunder King in Pandaria.
We are de only thing standing between dem and de city. We've got to stop dis while we still can!
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Kaza'jin by the warship in Warport Rastari.
